tool.name: Calculate Distance Matrix
tool.command: #set id = $distanceMat.dataset_id mkdir -p $__tool_directory__/out/ && perl $__tool_directory__/run_pipeline.pl #if str($geno_type.geno_source)=="hapmap" -h $hapmapGeno #else if str($geno_type.geno_source)=="vcf" -vcf $vcfGeno #else if str($geno_type.geno_source)=="plink" -plink -ped $plinkPed -map $plinkMap #else if str($geno_type.geno_source)=="flapjack" -flapjack -geno $flapjackGeno -map $flapjackMap #end if -sortPositions -distanceMatrix -export $__tool_directory__/out/out$id > $distanceMatLog && mv $__tool_directory__/out/out$id".txt" $distanceMat && rm -rf $__tool_directory__/out/
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Calculate Distance Matrix using TASSEL**
-----
**What this tool does**
This tool generates a distance matrix from the genotype data provided.
-----
**Input**
